author: Krista Miller
title: These Atlanta restaurants are hiring right now
text:
On Monday, October 5, Here 2 Serve Restaurants announced to employees that they were to close that evening . A message on their website confirmed the news that ten restaurants, including Twist, Noche and Strip were to close. Not known, is if this is permanent, as the group said in their message that they are "working on reorganization." What is know however, is that this news affects the 1,000 employees that are now in need of a new job.
As news spread of the sudden closings, restaurants around Atlanta stepped up to offer those affected jobs. Here is a roundup of restaurant jobs in Atlanta right now. Be sure to bookmark this page. New jobs will be added all day. If you know of any jobs, please put them in the comment section.
Fox Bros. BBQ
Both front of house and back of house staff are needed.Applicants are asked to stop by the restaurant and put in an application in person Monday -Thursday 9 - 11 am or 2 - 4 pm only. Fox Bros. BBQ is located at 1238 DeKalb Ave NE, Atlanta, GA 30307.
Metrotainment Cafes
Experienced staff is needed at all locations (Hudson Grille, Einstein's, Cowtippers, Joe's on Juniper, Sugar Shack, Guaco Joe's, Epic Events Catering and Metrotainment Bakery).They are hiring all positions, especially servers and manager. Please apply online at www.metrocafes.com or in-person at any location from 2 - 4 pm for an "on the spot" interview. Locations vary.
Diesel Filling Station
The Virginia Highland bar is looking to hire a full-time server. Apply in-person at the restaurant after 2pm Wednesday through Friday this week. Diesel Filling Station is located at 870 North Highland Avenue Northeast, Atlanta, GA 30306.
Hi-Five Diner
They are looking to hire experienced cooks to help with their diner concept open for breakfast, lunch and dinner, seven days a week. Resumes can be accepted at hifivediner@gmail.com or hr@grindhouseburgers.com .Hi-Five Diner is located at 903 Peachtree St NE, Atlanta, GA 30309.
DBA BBQ
DBa is looking to hire servers, a server/bartender and a line-cook at its Virginia Highland barbecue restaurant. Applicants can apply in-person Monday through Friday from 2 - 4 pm. DBA BBQ is located at 1190 North Highland Avenue Northeast, Atlanta, GA 30306.
Atlantic Seafood Company
The high-end seafood and sushi restaurant in Alpharetta, is looking to hire experienced front of house staff including servers. Applicants can apply in-person during regular business hours. Atlantic Seafood Company is located at 2345 Mansell Rd, Alpharetta, GA 30022.
Table & Main
The Roswell based southern restaurant is hiring for servers. Applicants can apply by sending their resumes to info@tableandmain.com. Table & Main is located at 1028 Canton St, Roswell, GA 30075.
Osteria Mattone
Italian concept Osteria Mattone is hiring front of house positions. Applicants can send their resumes to i nformation@osteriamattone.com. Osteria Mattone is located at 1095 Canton St, Roswell, GA 30075.
Fifth Group Restaurants
Fifth Group is hiring a wide variety of positions. Their restaurants include The Original El Taco, South City Kitchen, La Tavola, Alma Cocina, La Tavola, Ecco and Lure. You can search the positions which include both front of house and back of house, by going here. Locations vary.
H. Harper Station
Looking for a few servers and a weekend host. Applicants are asked to mail info@hharperstation.com. H. Harper Station is located at 904 Memorial Dr SE, Atlanta, GA 30316.
Castellucci Group
The Castellucci Group, which operates Cooks and Soldiers, Sugo, Iberian Pig and Double Zero, are looking for experienced servers. Double Zero is also hiring an experienced pizza cook. Applicants can apply here. Locations vary.
Farm Burger
All three Farm Burger locations are hiring for front of house staff. Apply in person at the location of your choice from 3 - 5 pm.
Common Quarter
Looking to fill all positions. Please apply in person from 3 - 5 pm. Common quarter is located at 1205 Johnson Ferry Rd #101, Marietta, GA 30068.
Local Three
Hiring position in the back of house and front of house. Specifically looking for line cooks and dishwashers. Interested applicants can go here to apply . Local Three is located at 3290 Northside Pkwy NW, Atlanta, GA 30327.
Better Half
Looking for an experienced cook. Better Half can be found at Bldg. C, 349 14th St NW, Atlanta, GA 30363.
Southbound
Actively hiring servers and open to considering all positions. Southbound is located at 5394 Peachtree Rd, Chamblee, GA 30341
Melting Pot
All Atlanta locations are currently interviewing front of house, back of house and management candidates. To inquire, please submit your resume to tmpresume@gmail.com . Locations vary.
Ray's Restaurants
The restaurant group that includes Ray's on the River, Ray's in the City, Ray's on the Creek and Ray's Rio Bravo is hiring for all positions. Those wishing to apply for front of house or back of house positions can head here . Managers can email johnschadl@raysrestaurants.com . Locations vary.
Honeysuckle Gelato
Hiring a weekend assistant manager for their new Ponce City Market location. Please send your resume to sales@honeysucklegelato.com . Honeysuckle Gelato is located at 675 Ponce De Leon Ave NE, Atlanta, GA 30308.
Souper Jenny
Looking for a couple of part time and full time positions, both in the back of house and front of house. They are hiring those with experience and outgoing personalities. If you refer someone who is hired, Souper Jenny will send you a $50 gift card to the restaurants. To apply, send an email and resume to souperjenny@aol.com. Locations vary.
The Luminary
The french bistro is looking for experienced positions for both front of house and back of house. Applicants can apply in person during normal business hours or send their resumes to info@theluminaryatl.com. The Luminary is located within Krog Street Market at 99 Krog Street, Atlanta, GA 30307.
Fellini's Pizza
Most locations are hiring cooks, line, prep, cashiers and floor. Applicants can send resumes and inquiries to fellinisatlanta@gmail.com. Locations vary.
West Egg Cafe
Interviewing managers and food runners. Those interested can email anna@westeggcafe.com. West Egg Cafe is located at 1100 Howell Mill Rd, Atlanta, GA 30318.
